name: Sandals of Faith
tooltip:
Sandals of FaithLevel 60

Father Inigo Montoy at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Sandals of Faith if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Sandals, 12 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 2 Mooncloth and 3 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Sandals
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 12
- Mooncloth x 2
- Cured Rugged Hide x 3
